original_text: When the Moabites woke up early the next morning, the sun was shining on the water. When they looked at the water from where they were, it looked like blood!
korean_text: 아침에 모압 사람이 일찍이 일어나서 해가 물에 비치므로 맞은편 물이 붉어 피와 같음을 보고

sentences.original_text: When the Moabites woke up early the next morning
sentences.korean_translation: 모압 사람들이 다음날 이른 아침에 일어났을 때

sentences.original_text: the sun was shining on the water
When they looked at the water from where they were
